TemplateConfiguration._Description: An empty Interface Builder document for creating an interface.

TemplateFiles.File: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> $if$ ($ProjectType$ == XamarinIOS) <document type="com.apple.InterfaceBuilder3.CocoaTouch.XIB" version="3.0" toolsVersion="6211" systemVersion="14A298i" targetRuntime="iOS.CocoaTouch" propertyAccessControl="none" useAutolayout="YES" useTraitCollections="YES"> $endif$ $if$ ($ProjectType$ == TVOS) <document type="com.apple.InterfaceBuilder.AppleTV.XIB" version="3.0" toolsVersion="6211" systemVersion="14A298i" targetRuntime="AppleTV" propertyAccessControl="none" useAutolayout="YES" useTraitCollections="NO"> $endif$ <dependencies> <plugIn identifier="com.apple.InterfaceBuilder.IBCocoaTouchPlugin" version="6204"/> </dependencies> <objects> <placeholder placeholderIdentifier="IBFilesOwner" id="-1" userLabel="File's Owner"/> <placeholder placeholderIdentifier="IBFirstResponder" id="-2" customClass="UIResponder"/> </objects> </document>
